job_description: Responsibilities will include, but are not limited to:-writing reliable and robust code, preferably using TDD.-designing relational and non-relational databases-help define and build the future architecture of key systems-contribute to technical planning and execution of projects
job_requirements: Qualifications and Skills:-strong knowledge and experience in web development with HTML5, Javascript, preferably Adobe Flex-experience using MS SQL-knowledge of UML and software design patterns-good problem solverIdeally you will have:-knowledge and experience with Adobe Flex, 4D databases, HTML5 and MySQL-working knowledge of FlashBuilder and Adobe LiveCycle-experience in the medical and/or healthcare industryOpen To All Majors:No
